LIST FUNCTIONS Create a List: From the home screen: Click the add list button from the navigation bar. From thee select the title of the list an icon and a color.
From the List page: Click the add list button from the navigation bar. From thee select the title of the list an icon and a color. Add items and edit a list: From the home screen or List screen: Click the list you want to edit. From here items can be added, removed, or marked as found.
Their quantities can be adjusted by clicking the '+' or '-' buttons.
Items can be removed by clicking the 'X'
A list can be deleted by holding down the list card on the List or Home screen.
